title: Nice product
content: If you are a student this is a good laptop at this price point.Basic coding, Suitable for CA,CS,CMA Students Advantages 1. Best Display in this price point. 5 star.2.Battery backup is good. 4star.3. Amazing performance in this price point. 5 star.4. Lightweight. 5 Fast charging.Disadvantages 1. Speaker quality very cheap. 1star. ( You are the person who always uses earphones or headphones, it's okay) 2 Over heating. 3 star.
